definition: to cut out (as a dress)/to cut/to trim/to reduce/to diminish/to cut back (e.g. on staff)/decision/judgment

sentences.english: Wilhelmina: I will need a talented seamstress.
sentences.chinese: 我需要一個有才能的女裁縫師。

sentences.english: "Let me be your apprentice, " said the boy, and the tailor agreed.
The seamstress cut off the dangling strands of thread.
sentences.chinese: 女裁縫師剪斷垂擺下來的一條線。

sentences.english: The king, hearing this, rewarded the tailor richly.
sentences.chinese: 聽到這個，國王重重獎賞了裁縫師。

sentences.english: I asked the tailor to take in my dress a little.
sentences.chinese: 我要求裁縫師將我的衣服改小一點。

sentences.english: There he met the town's finest tailor, who sewed for the royal family.
sentences.chinese: 在那裏他遇見城裏最好的裁縫師，他爲皇室縫製衣服。

sentences.english: Last May she met Hiro, a tailor, at a party.
sentences.chinese: 去年五月，她在一個宴會上遇見了裁縫師宏。

sentences.english: But I can recommend a tailor.
sentences.chinese: 但我可以推薦一個裁縫師。

sentences.english: He was bound apprentice to a tailor.
sentences.chinese: 他受縛做爲裁縫師的學徒。

sentences.english: Long ago, a poor tailor lived in a small village.
sentences.chinese: 很久以前，某個小村莊裏，有一位貧窮的裁縫師。

sentences.english: The tailor made a suit for Dick.
sentences.chinese: 這位裁縫師爲迪克做了一套西裝。

sentences.english: The seamstress carefully stitched the hem of the garment.
sentences.chinese: 女裁縫師小心縫著衣服的摺邊。

sentences.english: On her wedding day, the daughter hired an all-female singing and dancing group to perform.
sentences.chinese: 婚禮當天，裁縫師的女兒請了一個女歌舞團到場表演。

sentences.english: Then, the tailor quickly spoke in a arrogant manner.
sentences.chinese: 然後，裁縫師以傲慢的樣子很快地說。

sentences.english: The next day, the chief minister went into the room to check on the tailors' progress.
sentences.chinese: 隔天，牧師走進工作室裏檢查裁縫師的進度。

sentences.english: The tailors pretended that the cloth was real, as they showed it to the king.
sentences.chinese: 裁縫師假裝布料是真的，當他們將它展示給國王看時。

definition: to have a unique style of one's own (idiom)
Leonardo da Vinci (1452-1519), Italian Renaissance painter (Tw)
Macbeth (name)/Macbeth, 1606 tragedy by William Shakespeare 莎士比亞|莎士比亚
Jean Auguste Dominique Ingres (1780-1867), French Neoclassical painter
Lai Shengchuan (1954-), US-Taiwanese dramatist and director
